line_1: " How fierce the lurking tyger glares,
line_2: "How mild the heifer with thee shares

line_1: In vain (said I) the Golden Comet Glares,
line_2: It flam'd and mingled with the larger Stars;

line_1: High in the front of heaven when Sirius glares,
line_2: And o'er Britannia shakes his fiery hairs;

line_1: With spreading frogs and gleaming spangles glares:
line_2: To mortals as a Highlander appears,
